message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.
